name: Plaboscope
title: Exam preparation android quiz app
description: This app holds a special place in my heart as it was the whole reason I started my tech journey. I wanted to build a free resource for other doctors who were sitting the PLAB examination after I had just written it while using a lot of different resources. It serves questions and answers for doctors pr It is an android application initially written in Java but converted to Kotlin, using an MVVM pattern with a firebase backend.

name: EDD
title: Pregnancy information calculator for medical professionals
description: This is an android application that solved the very simple problem of calculating a pregnant woman’s expected date of delivery  or estimated gestational age. I found all the solutions available clunky and a lot of my colleagues and other users agree with me.

name: Spot
title: Work automation tool that creates spreadsheets
description: This is an application I wrote in python that integrates with Telegram to allow myself and my work colleagues to generate pdf reports. I use firebase to save user data and a headless chromium browser to preview templates and it is hosted on amazon EC2 instance.

name: Ibiyemi
title: Retail inventory and sales application
description: A Fullstack Django web application with a React frontend. This has gone through many iteration cycles based on user feedback and this thought me a very valuable lesson in putting customer’s needs first. Thoroughly enjoyed working on this.

name: Tellerbase
title: School management and payment processing application
description: My proudest achievement till date. It was, and is still being built with my amazing cofounders. Find out more about the amazing work we’re doing below.
